DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether transdermal hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) influence smoke cessation variable postmenopausal woman undergo short-term abstinence cigarette . Women recruit two group accord pre-enrollment medication status - currently HRT ( n = 17 ) HRT ( n = 13 ) . The HRT group prior medication replace standard 0.1 mg estradiol transdermal system 2.5 mg Cycrin daily . Following two week medication adjustment , participant continue smoke usual one week , time baseline measurement take . For remain two week , participant instruct quit smoking . They provide smoke cessation counseling monitor abstinence . Data collect five clinic visit dependent measure : Minnesota Nicotine Withdrawal Scale , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) Scale , Profile Mood States , Motor Speed Tasks , Reaction Time Test . Part II identical Part I , except randomizes participant use nicotine patch .
